name: Tanking Through Unknown
description:
You are surrounded by darkness and only the bullets can lighten it up.

But they can also show your location!

Fight with the others to became true warrior of the darkness!

Use left thumbstick to move and rightstick to aim. Left trigger shoots the bullet, right trigger shoots the flare that can dispel the darkness.

Also - watch out for spikes!

The first who get 10 frags - wins!

---------

To play you will need xbox controllers. There are two modes - for 2 players and for 4 players.
